attr.name: importInputID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DirectoryImportService stage in the import pipeline.

attr.name: importStorageID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DirectoryStorageService stage in the import pipeline.

attr.name: anonymizerInputID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DirectoryImportService stage in the anonymizer pipeline.

attr.name: anonymizerID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DicomAnonymizer stage in the anonymizer pipeline.

attr.name: anonymizerStorageID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DirectoryStorageService stage in the anonymizer pipeline.

attr.name: exportInputID
attr.helptext: The ID of the DirectoryImportService stage in the export pipeline.

attr.name: exportOutputID
attr.helptext: The ID of the HttpExportService stage in the export pipeline.

attr.name: exportManifestLogID
attr.helptext: The ID of the ManifestLogger plugin.

attr.name: cacheID
attr.helptext: The ID of the ObjectCache in the Anonymization pipeline.
